Articles.Content:
The Modular Robotic Vehicle that Nasa made is awesome! Its really interesting how a vehicle can have a small turning radius.

[http://www.space.com/29352-nasa-vehicle-changes-everything-about-driving-video.html](http://www.space.com/29352-nasa-vehicle-changes-everything-about-driving-video.html)
I thought MRV stood for Mars Return Vehicle. Now I'm sad.

> 
> I thought MRV stood for Mars Return Vehicle. Now I'm sad.

you and me both

Usually it's called an *Earth* Return Vehicle.

But I was expecting something like Mars Roving Vehicle.
Mars Reconnaissance Vehicle, a satellite if you will.
